name: Kaskus Quote Autohide
description: Limits quote element height by default, showing the full contents only when hovered.
additional_info:
Future changelogs and versioning info will be released at the following Github repository :
https://github.com/s4nji/kaskus-userstyles

------------------

r7 - 9 September 2013
> Removed images from showing in the the shrunk - unhovered- quote box

r6 - 5 September 2013
> Removed top border of concatenated quote elements.

r5 - 22 July 2013
> Improvised @-moz-document parameter [thx=AMZMA]
> Updated border styles of quote elements

r4 - 21 July 2013
> Removed hover info box

r3 - 21 July 2013
> Changed hover info box positioning ( now inside the quote element )
> Unhide hover info box for quote element inside quote element

r2 - 21 July 2013
> Removed transition due to buggy & unstable effect
> Reduced hidden height to 20px
> Changed positioning method
> Changed border color

r1 - 21 July 2013
> Initial Release
